SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.POWERSHELL_UTILITY :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_JBOSS_V7.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_JBOSS_V7.PRV.INCLUDE.JBOSS_CLI@WINDOWS
:SET &UC4RB_JBOSS_CLI# = &UC4_JBOSS_CLI#
$env:NOPAUSE="True"
function FailIfMissing { : IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_TYPE# = 'Queue' Write-Host 'Queue name &UC4RB_JBOSS_NAME# did not exist' : ELSE Write-Host 'Topic name &UC4RB_JBOSS_NAME# did not exist' : ENDIF : IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_FAIL_MISSING# = "YES" exit 1 : ELSE exit 0 : ENDIF }
:IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_TYPE# = 'Queue' : SET &UC4RB_JBOSS_JMS_TYPE# = 'jms-queue' :ELSE : IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_TYPE# = 'Topic' : SET &UC4RB_JBOSS_JMS_TYPE# = 'jms-topic' : ELSE : PRINT Unknown resource type: &UC4RB_JBOSS_TYPE# : EXIT 1 : ENDIF :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_OPERATING_MODE# = 'Managed Domain' : IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_PROFILE# = '' : PRINT Profile must not be empty : EXIT 1 : ELSE : SET &UC4RB_JBOSS_JMS_QUERY_CMD# = '/profile=&UC4RB_JBOSS_PROFILE#/subsystem=messaging/hornetq-server=default' : SET &UC4RB_JBOSS_JMS_COMMAND# = '&UC4RB_JBOSS_JMS_TYPE# --profile=&UC4RB_JBOSS_PROFILE#' : ENDIF :ELSE : SET &UC4RB_JBOSS_JMS_QUERY_CMD# = '/subsystem=messaging/hornetq-server=default' : SET &UC4RB_JBOSS_JMS_COMMAND# = '&UC4RB_JBOSS_JMS_TYPE#' :ENDIF
Write-Host Checking queue/topic existence..
! check if the queue/topic existed already $result = &UC4RB_JBOSS_CLI# --connect --command="&UC4RB_JBOSS_JMS_QUERY_CMD#/&UC4RB_JBOSS_JMS_TYPE#=&UC4RB_JBOSS_NAME#:read-resource"
$result = $result | select-string -pattern '"outcome" => "success"' -caseSensitive
if (![bool]($result)) { FailIfMissing }
Write-Host Deleting queue/topic..
! remove queue/topic using JBoss CLI command :IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_TYPE# = 'Queue' &UC4RB_JBOSS_CLI# --command="&UC4RB_JBOSS_JMS_COMMAND# remove --queue-address=&UC4RB_JBOSS_NAME#" : INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_POWERSHELL_CMD@WINDOWS $result = &UC4RB_JBOSS_CLI# --command="&UC4RB_JBOSS_JMS_QUERY_CMD#/address-setting=jms.queue.&UC4RB_JBOSS_NAME#:remove" :ELSE : IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_TYPE# = 'Topic' &UC4RB_JBOSS_CLI# --command="&UC4RB_JBOSS_JMS_COMMAND# remove --topic-address=&UC4RB_JBOSS_NAME#" : INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_POWERSHELL_CMD@WINDOWS $result = &UC4RB_JBOSS_CLI# --command="&UC4RB_JBOSS_JMS_QUERY_CMD#/address-setting=jms.topic.&UC4RB_JBOSS_NAME#:remove" : ENDIF :ENDIF
$result = &UC4RB_JBOSS_CLI# --command=":reload"
! re-check sleep 5 $result = &UC4RB_JBOSS_CLI# --command="&UC4RB_JBOSS_JMS_QUERY_CMD#/&UC4RB_JBOSS_JMS_TYPE#=&UC4RB_JBOSS_NAME#:read-resource"
$result = $result | select-string -pattern '"outcome" => "success"' -caseSensitive
if ([bool]($result)) { Write-Host Delete queue/topic finished unsucessfully exit 1 }
Write-Host Successfully deleted queue/topic :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_POWERSHELL_CMD@WINDOWS
